import React, { useState, useRef } from 'react' import styles from '../styles/CigarForm.module.css' import inputStyle from '../styles/InputStyles.module.css' const CigarForm = (props) => { const { onSubmitProp } = props const submitHandler = (e) => { e.preventDefault() onSubmitProp({ name, brand, description, rating }) setBrand('') setName('') setDescription('') setRating('') } return (
setBrand(e.target.value)} value={brand} name='brand' type='text' />
setName(e.target.value)} value={name} name='name' type='text' />
